title: don’t worry about people
content: don’t worry about people “There comes a point in your life when you realize: Who matters, who never did, who won’t anymore, and who always will. So, don’t worry about people from your past, there’s a reason why they didn’t make it to your future.” ― Adam Lindsay Gordon Sometimes we need the distance to be able to look at things more clearly. People grow at different rates and in different directions. Let them talk all they want behind your back, you know they'll eventually shut up the moment they hear the sound of your footsteps.
